_source.text: 50/50 Challenge: Last weekend I saw  John Carter  (fun, and better than I expected), as well as Guy Ritchie's  RocknRolla , starring Gerard Butler, Tom Hardy, Thandie Newton, and a host of other amazing actors (abso-freaking-lutely awesome).

text: 50/50 Challenge: Last weekend I saw  **John** **Carter**  (fun, and **better** **than** I expected), as well as Guy
Ritchie's  RocknRolla , starring Gerard **Butler**, Tom Hardy, Thandie Newton, and a host of other amazing actors (abso-freaking-lutely awesome).
